title: Senior QA/QC Test Engineer/Designer (Japanese N2+)
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
The Opportunity
The Opportunity

As our business continues to grow, we are looking for Japanese Test Designer who can contribute to manual test case management, communicate with relating stakeholder and develop the application in cooperation with the product manager, working in the form of Squad, a small team can quickly and consistently engage in everything from design to development, testing and operation.
Job Scope
Job Scope

Performing test analysis, design and execution of web and mobile applications
Creating test reports
Having a high awareness of product quality, such as improving system requirement definition accuracy and improving UAT process, while creating and implementing under your own plan
By being involved in the early stages of a project, detecting and responding quickly to risk factors such as bugs and schedules.
Planning and implementing measures to prevent recurrence of problems

Development environment
Development environment

Automation test: Autify
Backend: Ruby(on Rails), Go, Amazon Aurora(MySQL), Elasticsearch, DynamoDB
FrontEnd: Nuxt.js/Vue.js, ReactJS
Mobile App: Kotlin, Swift, Flutter
Deploy/ Build: CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CircleCI, GitHub Actions
Others: swagger, Docker, ZenHub, Figma

title: Senior QC Engineer (QA QC, Tester)
company: The Rep. Office of STYL Solutions Pte. Ltd. In HCMC
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc

Ride on the wave of Industry 4.0! Join STYL Solutions in the forefront of using Fintech and IoT technologies for smart city/nation transformation. Headquartered in Singapore with an R&D center in Vietnam, STYL Solutions designs, develops, and supplies hardware, software, and integrated solutions for applications in payment, loyalty management, location tracking, self-service operation, and telemetry. Our market segment coverage extends from financial services, retail, mass transit, and education to social services markets in Singapore and South Asia Pacific.

Ride on the wave of Industry 4.0! Join STYL Solutions in the forefront of using Fintech and IoT technologies for smart city/nation transformation. Headquartered in Singapore with an R&D center in Vietnam, STYL Solutions designs, develops, and supplies hardware, software, and integrated solutions for applications in payment, loyalty management, location tracking, self-service operation, and telemetry. Our market segment coverage extends from financial services, retail, mass transit, and education to social services markets in Singapore and South Asia Pacific.
Our vision is to use Fintech and IoT to create smart and efficient cities that enhance Quality of Life through convenience and healthier living.
Our vision is to use Fintech and IoT to create smart and efficient cities that enhance Quality of Life through convenience and healthier living.
We're looking for an ambitious Senior QC Engineer to join our team.
We're looking for an ambitious Senior
Senior
QC Engineer
QC Engineer
to join our team.
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:

Design, develop, and execute functional test cases that ensure the software meets the intended requirements and quality standards.
The engineer shall perform the test activity: generate and send test reports to the team lead and project manager and follow up for issue verification and bug resolution.
Work with the development team to convert the requirements and design documents into a test plan containing an overview, collection of test cases, and test scenarios. 
Participate in improving test processes, and propose new ideas on how to improve customer satisfaction and the quality of products. 
Review test cases and scripts created by other team members to ensure that proper test coverage has been developed.
Collaborate with Development and DevOps teams to ensure the necessary data/builds/infrastructure are built and available and that test environments are available and functional. 
Work with the end users to guide and manage the user acceptance phase of testing.
Research and identify methodologies and tools to improve the software testing process.

Here at STYL Solutions, we encourage our employees to take initiative, propose ideas, and provide them with the opportunity to dive into multiple projects. We are looking for candidates who possess the following:

Knowledge of software development life cycle, Agile, Scrum, Kanban methodologies
Knowledge utilizing test management tools such as Jira/Testrail
Time management, prioritization, and independence as well as keen attention to detail.

title: Mid/Senior QA Engineer (Manual,Auto,Agile)
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
Requirements
Requirements

About the Role: MTI Technology is seeking a Quality Assurance Engineer to join our Agile Team. You will work with other Agile teams to enhance our quality processes. Your primary objective will be to ensure the quality of the product and provide consultancy on QA processes and knowledge for others.
 
Your core responsibilities will include:
About the Role:
Your core responsibilities will include:

Analyze and clarify project issues, and effectively communicate with planners and product owners.
Develop and implement checklists, test cases, test procedures, test reports, defect logs, and bug analysis reports.
Manage and execute tests according to the plan, including providing test results and comprehensive test reports.
Preparing test data as required
Attending and contributing to Scrum events (Daily Stand up, Sprint Planning, Review, Retrospective)
As a Scrum team member, contributing to shape our products by providing input on user stories and designs and by giving feedback on usability
Coordinate with other internal development teams to ensure tasks are completed efficiently.
Provide consultancy on QA processes and share knowledge with the team.
Analyze and clarify project issues, and effectively communicate with planners and product owners.

As a Scrum team member, contributing to shape our products by providing input on user stories and designs and by giving feedback on usability
Coordinate with other internal development teams to ensure tasks are completed efficiently.
Provide consultancy on QA processes and share knowledge with the team.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
Who Are We Looking For:
Who Are We Looking For:

Good English communication skills with experience working in a matrix organization
Solid understanding of various testing types and techniques are needed (e.g., API testing, performance testing, mobile application testing). (5+ years of experience) 
Understand and have experience working with Agile methodology and project/test management tools (Jira, Confluence, TestRail)
Comfortable working with Desktop and Mobile browsers, including using browser inspector tools.
Positive and progressive mindset. Logical thinking and strong business analysis skills.
Open-mindedness and flexibility in tailoring project processes.
Self-starter – willing to contribute wherever needed
Having knowledge in automated testing platforms.

title: Junior/Senior QA Engineer (Tester/QA QC)
linh_vuc: Truyền Thông, Quảng Cáo và Giải Trí
description: Mô tả công việc
ABOUT US:
ABOUT US:

At OL Vietnam, we have been working with our sister company Orange Logic at empowering our Fortune 100 clients. You’ll work with a team of top developers to build flexible, scalable, and streamlined systems that will define the future of business management.

The company's flagship product is a web-based application designed to manage large-scale media libraries (photos, videos, audio files, documents...). As a direct result of 15+ years of independent R&D, Cortex is the most flexible DAM on the market and the solution chosen by Amazon, BBC, United Nations, National Geographic, WWF,…  to manage their large digital assets libraries
Orange Logic is in a fairly unique and robust financial position with no debt, we are:

Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision. 
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
Independent: we can adopt a longer term vision.
Stable: we are less affected by economic conditions. For example, there were no layoffs or compensation cuts during the Covid economic downturn. We even kept hiring!
The same core group of tech driven founders is driving the strategy today, with an obsession for the product.
MISSION:
MISSION:
As a QAE, you will help to ensure that the product systematically meets and exceeds our users’ expectations.
You will contribute by designing & executing the most efficient manual testing strategy to ensure that:
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
90+% of defects are identified & documented before reaching the end-users
Exclusive of defects that can only be detected in the client environment
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
All features behave as they should (i.e no regression)
For all the releases supported
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
All new features are evaluated from an End User perspective
Understand users and create relevant testing scenarios
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Proactively suggest improvements for our product and methodologies
Report what does not work well or is broken, even if not part of the current assignments
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
The ideal candidate has a very strong drive to build the perfect product combined with organizational skills, attention to detail, and a high level of empathy, including:

Significant experience with manual testing of complex applications required
Proficiency in English (both verbal and written)
A strong fundamental understanding of software development.
Strong self-discipline for delivering well-tested, complete features/modules under a tight schedule and the capability for rational thinking.
Significant experience with manual testing of complex applications required
Proficiency in English (both verbal and written)
A strong fundamental understanding of software development.
Strong self-discipline for delivering well-tested, complete features/modules under a tight schedule and the capability for rational thinking.

title: Middle/Senior QC Engineer (QA/QC)
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc

Thực hiện thử nghiệm từ mọi cấp độ bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn ở System, Integration, và Regression. Kết hợp các tiêu chuẩn quốc tế có liên quan và phù hợp vào các quy trình phát triển sản phẩm, tiêu chuẩn chất lượng và quy trình thử nghiệm. 
Xác định các loại và biến thể kiểm tra chất lượng dựa trên nhu cầu và yêu cầu của doanh nghiệp, đồng thời phát triển các quy trình kiểm tra. 
Xác định các biện pháp phù hợp về chất lượng để thử nghiệm và đóng góp vào việc phát triển các kịch bản và kế hoạch thử nghiệm. 
Tiến hành nhiều bài kiểm tra chất lượng khác nhau và phân tích dữ liệu để xác định các điều kiện vận hành và sử dụng trong đó hiệu suất của các biện pháp chất lượng bắt đầu giảm.
Báo cáo, theo dõi và giám sát các lỗi.
Hợp tác chặt chẽ với các thành viên nhóm và phòng ban khác.
Hỗ trợ các bộ phận liên quan trong quá trình sử dụng và vận hành sản phẩm.
Hình thức phỏng vấn: 1 Vòng (Làm bài test + Phỏng vấn năng lực chuyên môn và khả năng phù hợp văn hoá công ty).

title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc

At Aperia, we rely on a dynamic team of engineers to solve the many challenges and puzzles of our rapidly evolving technical stack. We’re seeking a Senior QA Engineer to provide automation testing for Aperia’s products. Successful candidates for this role will design and implement QA test plans including automation following the approved QA framework at Aperia.
Core Responsibilities
Core Responsibilities

Implement a comprehensive test strategy, test plans, test execution of product.
Create automation scripts and optimize those scripts.
Evaluate, select, and formulate the best usage of test automation tools and future alignment for different products and applications.
Use the Aperia framework for Functional Automation, Performance Testing and Security and Penetration Testing. Presents technical documentation for review by peers and the Development community.
Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities including test automation, test strategy, test plans, and test execution.
Respond appropriately and competently to the demands of work challenges when confronted with changes, ambiguity, adversity, and other pressures.

Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities including test automation, test strategy, test plans, and test execution.
Respond appropriately and competently to the demands of work challenges when confronted with changes, ambiguity, adversity, and other pressures.
Functional Responsibilities
Functional Responsibilities

Work hand-in-hand with Aperia scrum teams to resolve technical issues in the product as needed. 
Lead regression testing based on technical analysis, complexity, and reusability.
Troubleshoot issues in existing applications when needed and communicate investigation outcomes for sponsors, project leaders, and clients.
Excellent inter-personal and communication skills, able to engage with users and stakeholders across disciplines, verbally and in writing.

Required Technical Skills
Required Technical Skills

5+ experience in web application testing, including 3+ years in automation. 
Proven experience in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts and experience in programming languages like Java (most preferred), .NET, C#. 
Expert in automation frameworks such as Selenium and JMeter (most preferred), JUnit, TestNG, Playwright, and Azure Load Test.
Proven experience in UI and/or API level test automation.
Experience in high volume, high throughput web environment.
Ability with web performance infrastructure (CDNs, caching, reverse-proxies) and cloud resources (Azure).
Experience with high performance websites catering to millions of daily traffic.
Thorough understanding and direct experience in developing and enhancing automation testing frameworks.
Strong troubleshooting and root cause analysis abilities.

title: Senior QA/QC Engineer (Manual, Agile)
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc

Live Payments is seeking a Quality Assurance/Quality Control Engineer to join our growing multinational team based in Vietnam. Reporting directly to our Vietnam based Team Leader, your key objective will be ensuring the quality of our existing and future products. Core duties include:

Performing test activities such as test execution, capturing/ analyzing test results and raising and tracking defects
Performing different test methods, including integration tests, functional tests, system tests, acceptance tests, performance tests, and regression tests
Designing and writing test cases, regression tests and test scenarios
Maintaining existing test artifacts and regression test suite
Preparing test data as required
Attending and contributing to Scrum events (Daily Stand up, Sprint Planning, Review, Retrospective)
As a Scrum team member, contributing to shape our products by providing input on user stories and designs and by giving feedback on usability
Preparing daily activity reports
Maintaining relationships with the project and other Live Payments’ teams

As a Scrum team member, contributing to shape our products by providing input on user stories and designs and by giving feedback on usability
Preparing daily activity reports
Maintaining relationships with the project and other Live Payments’ teams

KEY SKILLS

Good English communication skills with experience working in a matrix organization
Solid understanding of various testing types and techniques are needed
Experience working with Agile methodology and project/test management tools (Jira, Confluence, TestRail)
Self-starter – willing to contribute wherever needed
Commitment to quality and attention to detail
Passionate to improve yourself, our products, our software development process, and your team’s performance
People-oriented
Comfortable working with a cross functional team across countries

title: Mid/Senior Hybrid QA/QC Engineer (Manual & Automation)
linh_vuc: Sản Phẩm Phần Mềm và Dịch Vụ Web
description: Mô tả công việc
SMG Swiss Marketplace Group (based in Switzerland) is a pioneering network of online marketplaces and a leading European digital company that simplifies people’s lives with forward-looking products.
SMG Swiss Marketplace Group (based in Switzerland)
Our four business areas include Automotive, Real Estate, General Marketplaces, and Finance and Insurance.

Over 700 employees
13 Brands
8 physical offices in 5 countries
39.81M visits (October 2022)
10.77M users (October 2022):
Over 700 employees
13 Brands
8 physical offices in 5 countries
39.81M visits (October 2022)
10.77M users (October 2022):

SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam. We are officially named as one of the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces by the Great Place to Work Institute, the world's most well-known organization for work culture assessment.

We hire the best digital talents to meet the highest demands of our users and customers in Switzerland. In return, we offer an attractive, innovative, friendly, and stimulating work environment where you can reach your full potential, achieve your goals, and celebrate your successes.
SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam.
the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces
About the role
About the role

This job refers to our Automotive brands, Autoscout24 and Motoscout24. We are journeying to simplify our products and strengthen our technology stack through a large-scale rewrite. We’re building on a modern technology stack with Java, following best practices, and striving to build/measure/learn at a high cadence. Here’s your chance to join a great product team that collaborates with designers, product managers, researchers, and engineers from other fields.
What you will do:
What you will do:

Work as part of an agile team:
Be the voice of QA during agile ceremonies. Autonomously drive the testing life cycle to ensure quality from medium to large-size features while reducing the system's tech debt or legacy issues in assigned projects
Collaborate with agile teams to ship valuable product increments.
Actively participate in ticket refinement/grooming by bringing up unforeseen scenarios and use cases.
Perform thorough functionality tests:
Review acceptance criteria, developer notes, and design documents to formulate test cases.
Test domain-driven web and mobile-based applications referencing database-heavy back-end systems and check the consistency across devices, browsers, and operating systems.
Conduct periodic exploratory testing in test environments.
Be responsible for product quality:
Work with the engineering teams to derive testing requirements throughout the development cycle.
Provide inputs on high-level test scenarios, challenges, risks, resources, test estimates, etc., during test planning meetings.
Support Bug Triage process:
Reproduces debugs, isolates problems, and verifies fixes.
Report any bugs/defects found in a clear, friendly, and easily reproducible manner.
Keep track of incidents and do deep root cause analysis followed by recommended action items.
Tracks defects and helps troubleshoot errors.

Work as part of an agile team:
Be the voice of QA during agile ceremonies. Autonomously drive the testing life cycle to ensure quality from medium to large-size features while reducing the system's tech debt or legacy issues in assigned projects
Collaborate with agile teams to ship valuable product increments.
Actively participate in ticket refinement/grooming by bringing up unforeseen scenarios and use cases.
